WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

When we tried to retrieve more than 5000 records using Soap.Fetch method of XrmServiceToolkit. 
We got the below error but this error is not consistent this was occurred some time. 
__"Not enough storage is available to complete this operation"__

We have also attached the screenshot of error.

Can you have any solution on this.
 
Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: Issue while retrieve more than 5000 records

Comments.Message:
Hey There.

I am not too sure if the error has actually caused by the toolkit, but I have seen this error "Not enough storage is available to complete this operation" elsewhere while using IE

There is a known issue from the early ages of IE. Mainly caused by a layer building process until it reaches 31 of them (for example if you have like 31 CSS files included in the page, IE will crash. You could find a bit research information through out the internet.

There maybe also a memory leak which could cause issue like this. 

I will keep a note and see if I have the same issue in some instances of my development, but as for now, I could not give you a proper solution.

Regards,
Jaimie
